Uses of Scanner.Action in org.glassfish.gmbal.tools.file
 

Classes in org.glassfish.gmbal.tools.file that implement Scanner.Action
 class Recognizer
          Recognizes files according to patterns, and performs actions accordingly.
 

Methods in org.glassfish.gmbal.tools.file that return Scanner.Action
 Scanner.Action ActionFactory.getSkipAction()
          returns an action that returns true.
 Scanner.Action ActionFactory.getStopAction()
          returns an action that returns false.
 

Methods in org.glassfish.gmbal.tools.file with parameters of type Scanner.Action

 void Recognizer.addKnownSuffix(java.lang.String suffix, Scanner.Action action)
           
 boolean Scanner.scan(Scanner.Action action)
          Scan all files reachable from roots.
 void Recognizer.setDefaultAction(Scanner.Action action)
          This defines the default action.
 void Recognizer.setShellScriptAction(Scanner.Action action)
          If set, this defines the action taken for text files that start with the patter "#!", which is the standard for all *nix shell scripts.
